    • Method Detail

      • buildFromFiles

        public static WebGraph buildFromFiles(java.lang.String pagesFile,
                                      java.lang.String linksFile)
                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Build a WebGraph from two files.
        Parameters:
        pagesFile - file containing all the pages.
        linksFile - file containing links between these pages.
        Returns:
        returns a WebGraph created with these files.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown when the given files are not valid in some way.

      • addPage

        public void addPage(java.lang.String url,
                    java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> keywords)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Add a new WebPage to the WebGraph.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL of the new WebPage.
        keywords - The Keywords associated with the new Webpage.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the parameters are invalid, the WebGraph is full, or if the URL already exist in the WebGraph.
